Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary; Godric, saint
_description: St. Godric’s hymn to the Virgin — eight lines

BodDou207.First Lines:
Seinte marie clane virgine moder iesu crist
                    nazarene…
BodDou207.Last Lines:
…deliuere mine sennen regne in mi modbrig me to blisse wit
                    þi self god
